rows.label: qst102703_msg0001
rows.name:
Haven't seen you around these parts.
You after something?

rows.label: qst102703_msg0003
rows.name:
She headed off to Toxbloom Spring.
Said she was going to fetch ingredients
for her new remedy or something.

rows.label: qst102703_msg0004
rows.name:
Honestly, going to a place like that
without a proper guard for protection...
She's a crazy one, all right.

rows.label: qst102703_msg0101
rows.name:
Toxbloom Spring is across
Desta Plains, on the way to
the Ancient Wall.

rows.label: qst102703_msg0102
rows.name:
As you'd expect from the name,
it's a dangerous place, surrounded
by a poisonous swamp.

rows.label: qst102703_msg0103
rows.name:
If you're heading that way,
you'd best take care.

rows.label: qst102703_msg0201
rows.name:
Did you ever find that doctor
you were looking for?

rows.label: qst102703_msg0202
rows.name:
She's a weird one, all right, but
her skills are the real deal.

rows.label: qst102703_msg0203
rows.name:
I saw her at work as a military doctor
once. She took care of the patients
with frightening efficiency.
